author: Olivier Knox
title: Progressives (mostly) line up behind Bidens Ukraine policy
Democrats Fight Headwinds in Georgia and Beyond: The Problem Is Reality

sentence: Under the once-in-a-decade redistricting process, Georgia's Republican governor, Brian Kemp, signed into law a new map that transformed Ms. McBath's district to favor Republicans overwhelmingly.
title: Democrats are mindful of headwinds in Georgia, and everywhere else.
